element.name: C1-C4, upper cervical ventral spinal roots
element.modality: flexor motor, extensor motor, general sensory

element.name: C1 nerve
element.distribution: moves forward lateral to the lateral mass and medial to vertebral artery
element.modality: flexor motor, extensor motor, general sensory

element.name: C1 nerve, dorsal ramus
element.distribution: supplies all the muscles in suboccipital triangle
element.modality: flexor motor, extensor motor, general sensory

element.name: C1 nerve, ventral ramus
element.modality: flexor motor, extensor motor, general sensory
element.distribution: joins the ascending branches of C2 nerve
element.branches: muscular branch to sternocleidomastoid, rectus lateralis/capitis anterior, longus capitis; greater auricular nerve; lesser occipital nerve; branch to vagus nerve; superior root of ansa cervicalis

element.name: C2 nerve
element.modality: flexor motor, extensor motor, general sensory

element.name: C2 nerve, dorsal ramus
element.branches: divides into medial (greater occipital nerve - supplies the skin of the scalp as far as the vertex) and lateral branches

element.name: C2 nerve, ventral ramus
element.branches: divides into terminal ascending and descending branches; muscular branches to sternocleidomastoid, longus capitis/colli; inferior root of ansa cervicalis; greater auricular nerve; lesser occipital nerve
element.action: extends and rotates head, flexes vertebral column; flexes cervical vertebrae, flexes head

element.name: C3 nerve
element.modality: flexor motor, extensor motor, general sensory

element.name: C3 nerve, dorsal ramus
element.distribution: medial - skin after piercing the trapezius and the splenius; lateral - joins C2 dorsal ramus

element.name: C3 nerve, ventral ramus
element.branches: muscular branches to trapezius, longus capitis, longus colli, scalenus medius, levator scapulae; inferior root of ansa cervicalis; root to phrenic nerve
element.action: extends and rotates head, flexes vertebral column; Flexes head; Bends head laterally

element.name: C4 nerve
element.modality: flexor motor, extensor motor, general sensory

element.name: C4 nerve, dorsal ramus
element.distribution: supply the skin of C4 dermatome and the muscles of the back; medial - skin after piercing the trapezius and the splenius; lateral - supply the longissimus, cervicis, longissimus capitis, and iliocostalis cervicis

element.name: C4 nerve, ventral ramus
element.branches: muscular branches to trapezius, levator scapulae, longus colli; branch to phrenic nerve; small communication to C5 nerve; with C3 forms supraclavicular nerves
element.action: rotates head and pulls backward; flexes cervical vertebrae

element.name: C5-C8, lower cervical ventral spinal roots
element.modality: flexor motor, extensor motor, general sensory

element.name: C5 nerve
element.modality: flexor motor, extensor motor, general sensory

element.name: C5 nerve, dorsal ramus
element.distribution: medial - skin after piercing the trapezius and the splenius; lateral - longissimus, cervicis, longissimus capitis, and iliocostalis cervicis

element.name: C5 nerve, ventral ramus
element.branches: dorsal scapular nerve; muscular branch to scalene muscles; branch to long thoracic nerve/phrenic nerve; terminal part joins C6 to form upper trunk of brachial plexus
element.distribution: leads into the upper trunk, then to the lateral cord, and finally to the musculocutaneous nerve
element.action: extends cervical vertebrae; rotates head and pulls backward

element.name: C6 nerve
element.modality: flexor motor, extensor motor, general sensory

element.name: C6 nerve, dorsal ramus
element.distribution: skin of C6 dermatome and the muscles of the back; medial - skin after piercing the trapezius and the splenius; lateral - longissimus, cervicis, longissimus capitis, and iliocostalis cervicis

element.name: C6 nerve, ventral ramus
element.branches: to scalene muscles; long thoracic nerve; terminal part joins C5 to form upper trunk of brachial plexus
element.distribution: innervating many muscles of the rotator cuff and distal arm - subclavius, supraspinatus, infraspinatus, biceps brachii, brachialis, deltoid, teres minor, brachioradialis, serratus anterior, subscapularis, pectoralis major, coracobrachialis, teres major, supinator, extensor carpi radialis brevis, extensor carpi radialis longus, latissimus dorsi

element.name: C7 nerve
element.modality: flexor motor, extensor motor, general sensory

element.name: C7 nerve, dorsal ramus
element.distribution: supply the skin of C7 dermatome and the muscles of the back; medial - skin after piercing the trapezius and the splenius; lateral - longissimus, cervicis, longissimus capitis, and iliocostalis cervicis

element.name: C7 nerve, ventral ramus
element.branches: to scalene muscles; to long thoracic nerve; terminal part forms the middle trunk of brachial plexus
element.distribution: musculocutaneous nerve, ulnar nerve, radial nerve, wrist flexion and hand adduction

element.name: C8 nerve
element.modality: flexor motor, extensor motor, general sensory

element.name: C8 nerve, dorsal ramus
element.distribution: supply the skin of C8 dermatome and the muscles of the back; medial - skin after piercing the trapezius and the splenius; lateral - longissimus, cervicis, longissimus capitis, and iliocostalis cervicis; skin on the little finger, slightly past the wrist on the palmar and dorsal aspects of the hand and forearm

element.name: C8 nerve, ventral ramus
element.branches: to scalene muscles; to long thoracic nerve
element.distribution: flexion of the fingers, many mucles of trunk, upper arm, forearm, hand
